text: Gavin Lloyd Henson (born 1 February 1982) is a Welsh rugby union player. He was born in Pencoed, South Wales. He plays for Bath Rugby. He has two children with singer Charlotte Church. ==Other websites== *WRU Player Profile *ESPN Scrum Profile *Aviva Premiership Player Profile *Blues profile Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:RC Toulonnais players Category:Welsh rugby union players
title: Gavin Henson
